long_description: The Timbuk2 Pinch Phone Wallet brings your go-everywhere items-phone, cards, cash and driver's license- together into a single, convenient package. Oh, sweet harmony! Half billfold and half phone protector, the Pinch lets you use your smartphone without exposing it to the elements and simultaneously secures your cards and cash. Separate compartments let you organize your essentials; outside zippered pocket holds coins. The Timbuk2 Pinch Phone Wallet is made of fine-weave ballistic fabric for durability. Closeout.
short_description: The Timbuk2 Pinch Phone Wallet brings your go-everywhere items-phone, cards, cash and driver's license- together into a single, convenient package. Oh, sweet harmony!
